programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that they’re cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s “fun-crastinating” puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. Our villains’ alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.desc: Skid unleashes an evil robot on Turbotown and has to get rid of the monster himself; Turbo falls for and betroths a head-eating mantis princess.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Dimension Demented When Ra tries to bring a jukebox to school by stuffing it into the Dimension Tube, he ends up sending himself on a terrifying inter-dimensional journey. The Taming of The Gloutch Gloutch raising—a test all Scare School students must take—involves raising a cute, adorable creature into a terrifying monster.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are building a toy tower. Carlton is joining in and having a great time. They've almost finished when one of the brick pieces goes missing! Oh no. How can they finish the tower without the last brick? Noddy needs to investigate. Using his detecting skills Noddy soon finds the missing brick. But when he gets back to the Toy Green to finish the tower, he discovers that another brick has gone missing! What's going on? This investigation is really complicated! Noddy works out that the bricks were taken by Carlton. The big cat admits that he was having so much fun playing that he didn't want the game to end! Everyone forgives him and they decide to carry on playing all afternoon, all thanks to Noddy! Well done!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

programme.desc: On Harper’s first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harper’s Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Eden’s fairy home. But it creates a BIG problem when Harper’s family wants to visit grandma and the car keys are nowhere to be found! / When Harper gets sick, Marcus builds a pulley between their apartments to send Harper treats. But when Qwak, the chipmunk, breaks the pulley, the Dews must step in to keep the treat train running.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: Lucky and Bebe spend the weekend pretending to be besties when their fathers come for a family visit and reveal that they're old friends.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: As a new term begins, Maricela and her horse, Mystery, arrive at the academy to join Lucky, Pru and Abigail for the school year.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: An adorable orphan named Li'l Pequena is revealed to actually be a changeling who altered the townspeople's memories and convinced them that she's been there all along

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When the gang chases Li'l Pequena into the portal, everyone but Puss gets super-powers and must join forces with a sorceress to overthrow the Blind King

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Today is Yarn Ball Day, a special day in the cat-filled town of Meowbuquerque. Unfortunately, the bridge leading to the party is broken. With time ticking, Tag, Scooch, and Kit work together at getting the cats across to the party. / When The Barkapellas announce that they’re cancelling their biggest concert ever, Tag is determined to figure out why in order to get them back on stage. But with a stadium full of impatient fans, Tag is going to have to work fast.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelp’s “fun-crastinating” puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot “Qilin” and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert – but magical – chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimi’s not exactly who she says she is. Our villains’ alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Klaus is injured and Veruca’s mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Veruca’s rekindled powers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.desc: Dimension Demented When Ra tries to bring a jukebox to school by stuffing it into the Dimension Tube, he ends up sending himself on a terrifying inter-dimensional journey. programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are building a toy tower. Carlton is joining in and having a great time. They've almost finished when one of the brick pieces goes missing! Oh no. How can they finish the tower without the last brick? Noddy needs to investigate. Using his detecting skills Noddy soon finds the missing brick. But when he gets back to the Toy Green to finish the tower, he discovers that another brick has gone missing! What's going on? This investigation is really complicated! Noddy works out that the bricks were taken by Carlton. The big cat admits that he was having so much fun playing that he didn't want the game to end! Everyone forgives him and they decide to carry on playing all afternoon, all thanks to Noddy! Well done!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Mrs Goggins is on holiday, so Sarah Gilbertson is looking after her dog Bonnie. She calls in on Pat and proves she has zero control over the dog. But there is only time for Jess to roll his eyes before Pat is called out on a special delivery - it's urgent! He has to deliver the RADARSCOPE (designed by Ted) to Mrs Goggins, who is up in Scotland! Pat has no idea what a radarscope is and neither does Ben. But they know what urgent means, so they spring into action and load it into Pat's jet plane. Back in Greendale Bonnie gives Sarah the slip, and PC Selby becomes embroiled in an escalating search... up in Scotland meanwhile, Pat lands but doesn't even get an explanation of the radarscope as time is pressing, and he, Jess, and their technological bit of kit are bundled into a boat and they set out over the loch... Loch Ness! While the search for mischievous Bonnie intensifies back home, Pat realizes they are searching for a creature of their own - the Loch Ness Monster!

The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wife’s death.

programme.title: Indak
programme.desc: Vin (Sam Concepcion) invites a simple island girl, Jen (Nadine Lustre), to join Indak Pinas, a dance group, after her dance video goes viral. The two not only find their groove, but also slowly fall for each other.

programme.title: Roadtrip
programme.desc: After their friend’s death, four women set out on the dream trip they planned as teenagers, rekindling old bonds as they pay their last respects.

programme.title: Maria
programme.desc: When a former BlackRose cartel assassin deliberately betrays them by refusing to complete her mission, the cartel orders her execution. Unbeknownst to them, she fakes her own death and is able to create a new life of her own.

programme.title: It's Cool Bulol
programme.desc: Red Sternberg stars as a campus nerd who has always been wanting to be accepted for what he is. He's smart, alright, but in an environment where substance takes a backseat to style, he is everybody's favorite laughingstock.

programme.title: Masamang Ugat
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated after their mother dies. One becomes a cop (Mikey Arroyo), the other an assassin (Ace Vergel). The cop ambitiously wants to bring down a drug lord supported by politicians, while the assassin works for the same drug lord.

programme.title: Bakit Lahat ng Gwapo May Boyfriend?
programme.desc: Kylie (Anne Curtis), a wedding planner has had a long string of boyfriends. Unfortunately for her, they've all been gay.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Patayan Files: Ang Pinakamalaking Murder Cases ng Dekada '90
programme.desc: Cheche Lazaro's Probe Archives goes in depth on the controversy behind the gruesome crimes that shocked the entire country during the 90s.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A usual chain mail is forwarded to a group of people. Some pass it while others ignore. One dies and is followed by series of sudden and unexplainable deaths of others. Soon after, a revelation begins to unfold, the chain mail is cursed and so Sandra (Shy Carlos) has to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortunes.

programme.title: Ang Kabit Ni Mrs. Montero
programme.desc: Ang Kabit Ni Mrs. Montero tells the story of a young, beautiful wife (Patricia Javier) who’s wealthy but paraplegic husband (Edu Manzano) cannot provide her the physical intimacy she desires.

programme.title: Pedro Penduko Episode 2 (The Return of the Comeback)
programme.desc: He is descendant of a Legendary hero, but for the young Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) heroism in the silver screen is more appealing than real life bravado. But Pedro is not destined to be a movie star, he finds himself in the center of a kingdom in need of a hero.

programme.title: Pagdating ng Panahon
programme.desc: Lynette (Sharon Cuneta) is a conservative & religious lady who leads a boring life. So when she gets a marriage proposal from Manuel (Robin Padilla), whose family is known to be a brood of chauvinists, she was ecstatic.

programme.title: First Love
programme.desc: In what appears to be a serendipitous encounter upon saving the life of a stranger, the calculated and reserved businessman Nick (Aga Muhlach) meets the impulsive and optimistic photographer Ali (Bea Alonzo), who believes in destiny and carpe diem.

programme.title: Andrea, Paano Ba Ang Maging Isang Ina?
programme.desc: Two teachers find themselves on opposite sides in the fight for freedom. Nora Aunor is the woman who chose to join the rebels while her friend, Gina Alajar opted for a quiet life with her husband.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Gising Na Ang Higanteng Natutulog
programme.desc: Sgt. Delfin Guerrero (Andy Poe), an honest, kind-hearted and dedicated motorcycle cop who took on corrupt politicians in his mission to uphold the law.

programme.title: Paikot-ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat Ng Damortis (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus’ murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Ang Mamatay Nang Dahil Sa Iyo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo characterizes a patriotic soldier whose amor patria runs curdling in his veins. His ideologies led him to a clash of opinions with his younger brother.

programme.title: Brown Ninja
programme.desc: Jun (Dante Varona) barely survives a massacre that wipes out his whole family. He was found by a blind, old man in the woods and is nursed back to health. The old man also teaches him the secrets of being a ninja. Jun makes use of his new skills to find his family's killers and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Isla Paraiso
programme.desc: A series of inexplicable and mind-boggling twists of incidents inside the hacienda take place as the animosity between two sisters heightens.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Diego
programme.desc: He is a member of an elite crop in the military. However,when his group decided to stage a coup against the government,he defied his head. What danger lurks in the jungle makes Diego a stark study of human fortitude and courage?

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Mangarap? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lisa (Vilma Santos) and Benny (Jay Ilagan) have found their match in each other. Unfortunately, Benny dies before they get married.

programme.desc: In Moreton Bay, Dr Ann gets in the water with a dugong as part of the world's largest dugong health check. A critical mission to help save the species globally. She learns that many dugong secrets can be found in their poo!

programme.title: Dr Karl's How Things Work
programme.desc: We know we shouldn't, but most of us can't resist the temptation of a lolly. At the Allen's factory, Dr Karl steps onto the factory floor to see how Snakes Alive are made - spoiler alert, the most popular flavour is red.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.desc: They were once the most famous refugee family in Australia. We check in with the Tamil family from the small town of Biloela who were at the centre of one of the country's biggest people-power movements in recent years.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEST, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A tired American ex-boxer returns to his native hamlet in Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by strict local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this lively film has beautiful scenery, brilliant repartee, and local charm.

programme.title: Star Trek (2009)
programme.desc: A prequel focusing on a young James T. Kirk and Mr. Spock, chronicling their first meeting at Starfleet Academy and their first space mission.

programme.title: Daredevil

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More

programme.desc: Captain Whip returns to Hawaii. He's inherited "worthless" land. He starts a plantation, staffed with a Chinese couple from his ship. Drilling thru lava for water and stealing/smuggling pineapple from French Guyana, things look brighter.

programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.desc: Joel Rifkin took the lives of 17 women in New York. Almost thirty years later, a TV producer leverages his relationship with New York's most prolific serial killer to get information police could use.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Gwinnett County Homicide investigates a parking lot brawl that leaves two young men shot dead, and could cost four others their lives in prison — though three of them never fired a shot.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: A historic Texan town is stunned when a popular caretaker is found dead and a beloved resident goes missing. But with support from a concerned community, detectives uncover the secrets that led to murder.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1)
programme.desc: Facing the death penalty, Jodi Arias takes the stand for an unprecedented 18-days in an attempt to explain how the brutal killing of her ex-boyfriend was self-defense.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A suspect makes a chilling confession about a string of gruesome crimes; a deadly mistake made by a politician comes to light in the interrogation room; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A murderer refuses to cooperate no matter how many questions he faces; a no-nonsense detective wants answers and gets them; an interrogation room can't hold a suspect looking to escape; and more.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Nacole Smith is brutally murdered in 1995 on a wooded path in Atlanta, the police and community rally around her mother as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Lisa Gaudenzi, fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.desc: A man is gunned down outside a local shop and authorities interrogate two of his acquaintances to find out which one of them pulled the trigger.
